resources.string: Default settings are used before you set up your customized profile. For more accurate BAC calculations, please update your profile.

This app was created to help hokies monitor their drinking, by keeping track of thier standard drinks. We use a BAC calculator to estimate your BAC and a reaction time game to test your reaction time.\n
You\'ve added a can of beer
You\'ve added a glass of wine
You\'ve added a shot of hard liquor
Tap screen to start reaction game.
You might have had a little too much to drink.
Good Samaritan Law: This law provides legal protection for an individual who may be under the influence, so that they will call 911 to seek help for a friend who has overdosed \n

If you see these signs of alocohol poisoning please call for help: 
Respiration: is less than 8 breaths per minute 
Irregular Breathing 
No Pain Response 
Unconsciouness 
Vomiting
You\'re BAC level is at 0%. You no longer have alcohol in your system, do you want to end your drinking session?

Positive Drinking Zone BAC <= .06%
Legal Driving Zone BAC <= .08%
Danger Zone BAC <= .10%

We calculate your BAC with the standard drinks below: 
Beer: 12 oz - 4.5% ABV 
Wine: 5 oz - 12.5% ABV 
Shot: 1.5 oz - 40.0% ABV
Research shows that there is a strong correlation between reaction time and level of drunkenness. People have 25% slower reaction time when drunk than when sober.
